author: Scott Bland
title: Biden raised campaign-best $46.7 million in March
description: But his fundraising slowed down in the second half of the month.
content: But Biden and the DNC outraised Trump and the RNC in March. The DNC, buoyed by an $18 million transfer from billionaire Mike Bloomberg's campaign that sparked a campaign finance complaint, brought in $32.7 million in March to the RNC's $24 million. Trump's ca… [+1160 chars]
